articles.author: Tom Coley
articles.title: Jose Mourinho tipped for shock Chelsea move as Arsene Wenger wades in on Julian Nagelsmann talk - Football.London
articles.description: Chelsea news: The Blues have a high-profile shortlist of options but there is disagreement amongst pundits over who the right man for the job is
articles.content: The race to become the new Chelsea head coach is hotting up with attention now firmly placed on the club after they exited the Champions League. Progressing in Europe was the only meaningful chance o… [+4399 chars]
